1.0.name: wordpress/wp-comment-mobile-push
1.0.description:
This plugin will work with CommentPush app on the Apple Appstore. With this plugin and CommentPush app on your iPhone, You never need check your blog manually again and again just looking for new comment. When new comment on your blog available, this plugin will send you a iPhone push notification about that.

CommentPush app work on iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad.

More detail, go to: http://devshare.org/CommentPush/
